item.title: How to Pull half shield & c key halfs themselves together
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

hi,

[size=36pt]Don’t Leech[/size]
for the [size=18pt]crystal key[/size]
go to client.java and search for

//attack potion

above or under it add
//crystal key if(((itemUsed == 985) && (otherItem == 987))){ deleteItem(985, getItemSlot(985), 1); deleteItem(987, getItemSlot(987), 1); addItem(989, 1); sM("You Have Created a Crystal Key!"); }

[size=18pt]for the dragon sq shield[/size]
search for

//attack potion

under or above it add
//dragon shield sq if(((itemUsed == 2366) && (otherItem == 2368))){ deleteItem(2366, getItemSlot(2366), 1); deleteItem(2368, getItemSlot(2368), 1); addItem(1187, 1); sM("You Have Created a dragon sq shield!");

credits:100% for me
[size=8pt]by Kalson744[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: How to Pull half shield & c key halfs themselves together
